original_text: Therefore Saul removed him from him, and made him his captain over a thousand; and he went out and came in before the people.
korean_text: 그러므로 사울이 그를 자기 곁에서 떠나게 하고 그를 천부장으로 삼으매 그가 백성 앞에 출입하며

sentences.original_text: Therefore Saul removed him from him
and made him his captain over a thousand
and he went out and came in before the people
